props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies contents of the component.

description.text: Specifies contents of the component.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Specifies the aria-label of the dialog.

description.text: Specifies the aria-label of the dialog.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: Specifies a callback to close the modal dialog.

description.text: Specifies a callback to close the modal dialog.

props.name: isOpen
props.docblock: Specifies whether the modal is open.

description.text: Specifies whether the modal is open.

props.name: hasCloseButton
props.docblock: Specifies whether the model hase close 'x' icon button in the top right of the dialog box.

description.text: Specifies whether the model hase close 'x' icon button in the top right of the dialog box.

props.name: size
props.docblock: Specifies size of the dialog box.

description.text: Specifies size of the dialog box.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: Specifies visual style of the dialog box.

description.text: Specifies visual style of the dialog box.

props.name: closeLabel
props.docblock: The label supplied to the close icon button if one is rendered

description.text: The label supplied to the close icon button if one is rendered

props.name: isFullscreenScroll
props.docblock:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ModalDialog.Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.

description.text:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ModalDialog.Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.

props.name: footerNode
props.docblock: Specifies footer for the dialog box.

description.text: Specifies footer for the dialog box.

props.name: beforeBodyNode
props.docblock: Specifies content that should be rendered before modal's body.

description.text: Specifies content that should be rendered before modal's body.

props.name: afterBodyNode
props.docblock: Specifies content that should be rendered after modal's body.

description.text: Specifies content that should be rendered after modal's body.

props.name: modalBodyClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name for modal's body component.

description.text: Specifies class name for modal's body component.

Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
